API: OpenAI Realtime API (gpt-realtime) over WebSocket
Formats: PCM16 in/out; sample-rate negotiation among 48000, 44100, 32000, 24000, 22050, 16000
Local VAD tuning via env: INPUT_RMS_GATE, VAD_START_GATE, VAD_STOP_GATE, VAD_MIN_SPEECH_MS, VAD_SILENCE_MS, HANGOVER_MS
Barge-in: enable with BARGE_IN=1; cancel via response.cancel; cooldown BARGE_CANCEL_COOLDOWN_MS
Mic gating while assistant is speaking; hangover after playback to avoid tail capture
Echo cancellation: PulseAudio module-echo-cancel (webrtc); virtual devices ec_source/ec_sink
Playback: RawOutputStream ring buffer; mono duplicated to stereo when needed
Interactive controls: m=mic mute toggle, s=stop speaking, r=hard reload persona/facts & new session, q=quit
Reload (r) performs a process restart to ensure fresh server-side context
README documents setup, AEC, VAD/barge-in tuning, and quick test commands
Known past issues fixed: invalid sample rate, asyncio queue/loop mixups, echo/feedback loops
Optional env: SKIP_INTRO=1 to skip initial greeting; VOICE selects the TTS voice
Device overrides: PREFERRED_INPUT / PREFERRED_OUTPUT can target ec_source/ec_sink
